item.title: Whats the byte array for members on a client
item.dc:creator: @iamprone iamprone
item.description:
@iamprone wrote:

Instead of donator on my server it has member. its all the same thing but its not the same thing on my client. I want to know whats the byte array for members so I can change the icon for them to the donator symbol.
This is the code I have so far.

For example. byte0 = playerights and cr1 = custom staff icon 1

if(s1 != null && s1.startsWith("@cr1@")) { s1 = s1.substring(5); byte0 = 1; } else if(s1 != null && s1.startsWith("@cr2@")) { s1 = s1.substring(5); byte0 = 2; } else if(s1 != null && s1.startsWith("@cr3@")) { s1 = s1.substring(5); byte0 = 3;

Now can some guru just help me find what I need to do because I don’t want to code a whole different server source, I am willing to pay part of my donations.

iamprone@hotmail.com to contact me.

Read full topic
